00059 #define HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN \
00060   do { \
00061     DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction(); \
00062     try
00063 
00064 #define HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(_cb_) \
00065     catch (Exception &e) { \
00066       if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
00067         if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
00068           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00069         else \
00070           HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
00071         txn->abort(); \
00072         _cb_->error(e.code(), e.what()); \
00073         return; \
00074       } \
00075       HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
00076       poll(0, 0, (System::rand32() % 3000) + 1); \
00077       continue; \
00078     } \
00079     break; \
00080   } while (true)
00081 
00082 #define HT_BDBTXN_END(...) \
00083     catch (Exception &e) { \
00084       if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
00085         if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
00086           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00087         else \
00088           HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
00089         txn->abort(); \
00090         return __VA_ARGS__; \
00091       } \
00092       HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
00093       poll(0, 0, (System::rand32() % 3000) + 1); \
00094       continue; \
00095     } \
00096     break; \
00097   } while (true)

00106 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, PropertiesPtr &props,
00107                ServerKeepaliveHandlerPtr &keepalive_handler,
00108                ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue_ptr)
00109   : m_verbose(false), m_next_handle_number(1), m_next_session_id(1),
00110     m_lease_credit(0) {
00111 
00112   m_verbose = props->get_bool("verbose");
00113   m_lease_interval = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00114   m_keep_alive_interval = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval");
00115 
00116   Path base_dir(props->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Dir"));
00117 
00118   if (!base_dir.is_complete())
00119     base_dir = Path(System::install_dir) / base_dir;
00120 
00121   m_base_dir = base_dir.directory_string();
00122 
00123   HT_INFOF("BerkeleyDB base directory = '%s'", m_base_dir.c_str());
00124 
00125   if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00126     HT_WARNF("Unable to open base directory '%s' - %s - will create.",
00127              m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00128     if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_base_dir.c_str())) {
00129       HT_ERRORF("Unable to create base directory %s - %s",
00130                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00131       exit(1);
00132     }
00133     if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00134       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open base directory %s - %s",
00135                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00136       exit(1);
00137     }
00138   }
00139 
00143   if (flock(m_base_fd, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB) != 0) {
00144     if (errno == EWOULDBLOCK) {
00145       HT_ERRORF("Base directory '%s' is locked by another process.",
00146                 m_base_dir.c_str());
00147     }
00148     else {
00149       HT_ERRORF("Unable to lock base directory '%s' - %s",
00150                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00151     }
00152     exit(1);
00153   }
00154 
00155   m_bdb_fs = new BerkeleyDbFilesystem(m_base_dir);
00156 
00160   get_generation_number();
00161 
00162   NodeDataPtr root_node = new NodeData();
00163   root_node->name = "/";
00164   m_node_map["/"] = root_node;
00165 
00166   uint16_t port = props->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00167   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00168 
00169   app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue( get_i32("workers") );
00170 
00171   boost::xtime_get(&m_last_tick, boost::TIME_UTC);
00172 
00173   m_keepalive_handler_ptr.reset(
00174    new ServerKeepaliveHandler(conn_mgr->get_comm(), this, app_queue_ptr));
00175   keepalive_handler = m_keepalive_handler_ptr;
00176 }

00179 Master::~Master() {
00180   delete m_bdb_fs;
00181   ::close(m_base_fd);
00182 }

00185 uint64_t Master::create_session(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00186   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00187   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00188   uint64_t session_id = m_next_session_id++;
00189   HT_INFOF("created session %llu", (Llu)session_id);
00190   session_data = new SessionData(addr, m_lease_interval, session_id);
00191   m_session_map[session_id] = session_data;
00192   m_session_heap.push_back(session_data);
00193   return session_id;
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 bool Master::get_session(uint64_t session_id, SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00198   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00199   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00200   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00201     return false;
00202   session_data = (*iter).second;
00203   return true;
00204 }
00205 
00206 void Master::destroy_session(uint64_t session_id) {
00207   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00208   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00209   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00210   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00211     return;
00212   HT_INFOF("destroyed session %llu", (Llu)session_id);
00213   session_data = (*iter).second;
00214   m_session_map.erase(session_id);
00215   session_data->expire();
00216   // force it to top of expiration heap
00217   boost::xtime_get(&session_data->expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 int Master::renew_session_lease(uint64_t session_id) {
00222   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00223 
00224   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00225   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00226     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00227 
00228   (*iter).second->renew_lease();
00229 
00230   return Error::OK;
00231 }
00232 
00233 bool
00234 Master::next_expired_session(SessionDataPtr &session_data, boost::xtime &now) {
00235   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00236   struct LtSessionData ascending;
00237 
00238   if (m_session_heap.size() > 0) {
00239     std::make_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00240     if (m_session_heap[0]->is_expired(now)) {
00241       session_data = m_session_heap[0];
00242       std::pop_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00243       m_session_heap.resize(m_session_heap.size()-1);
00244       m_session_map.erase(session_data->id);
00245       return true;
00246     }
00247   }
00248   return false;
00249 }
00250 
00251 
00255 void Master::remove_expired_sessions() {
00256   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00257   int error;
00258   std::string errmsg;
00259   std::set<uint64_t> handles;
00260   boost::xtime now;
00261   uint64_t lease_credit;
00262 
00263   {
00264     ScopedLock lock(m_last_tick_mutex);
00265     lease_credit = m_lease_credit;
00266   }
00267 
00268   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00269 
00270   // try recomputing lease credit
00271   if (lease_credit == 0) {
00272     lease_credit = xtime_diff_millis(m_last_tick, now);
00273     if (lease_credit < 5000)
00274       lease_credit = 0;
00275   }
00276 
00277   if (lease_credit) {
00278     ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00279     HT_INFOF("Suspension detected, extending all session leases "
00280              "by %lu milliseconds", (Lu)lease_credit);
00281     for (SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.begin();
00282          iter != m_session_map.end(); iter++)
00283       (*iter).second->extend_lease((uint32_t)lease_credit);
00284   }
00285 
00286   while (next_expired_session(session_data, now)) {
00287     if (m_verbose)
00288       HT_INFOF("Expiring session %llu", (Llu)session_data->id);
00289     session_data->expire(handles);
00290   }
00291 
00292   foreach(uint64_t handle, handles) {
00293     if (m_verbose)
00294       HT_INFOF("Destroying handle %llu", (Llu)handle);
00295     if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg, false))
00296       HT_ERRORF("Problem destroying handle - %s (%s)",
00297                 Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00298   }
00299 
00300 }

00306 void Master::create_handle(uint64_t *handlep, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00307   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00308   *handlep = ++m_next_handle_number;
00309   handle_data = new HandleData();
00310   handle_data->id = *handlep;
00311   handle_data->locked = false;
00312   m_handle_map[*handlep] = handle_data;
00313 }
00314 
00318 bool Master::get_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00319   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00320   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00321   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00322     return false;
00323   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00324   return true;
00325 }
00326 
00330 bool Master::remove_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00331   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00332   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00333   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00334     return false;
00335   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00336   m_handle_map.erase(iter);
00337   return true;
00338 }

00346 void
00347 Master::mkdir(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00348   std::string abs_name;
00349   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00350   std::string child_name;
00351 
00352   if (m_verbose) {
00353     HT_INFOF("mkdir(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00354   }
00355 
00356   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00357     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "directory '/' exists");
00358     return;
00359   }
00360 
00361   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00362 
00363   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00364     ScopedLock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00365 
00366     m_bdb_fs->mkdir(txn, name);
00367 
00368     txn->commit(0);
00369 
00370     // deliver event notifications
00371     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00372                                             child_name));
00373     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00374   }
00375   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00376 
00377   cb->response_ok();
00378 }

00385 void
00386 Master::unlink(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00387   std::string child_name;
00388   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00389   NodeDataPtr node;
00390 
00391   if (m_verbose) {
00392     HT_INFOF("unlink(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00393   }
00394 
00395   if (!strcmp(name, "/")) {
00396     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_PERMISSION_DENIED,
00397               "Cannot remove '/' directory");
00398     return;
00399   }
00400 
00401   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00402     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00403     return;
00404   }
00405 
00406   get_node(name, node);
00407   {
00408     boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(node->mutex);
00409     if (node->reference_count() > 0) {
00410       cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_OPEN,
00411                 "Reference count > 0");
00412       return;
00413     }
00414   }
00415 
00416   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00417 
00418   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00419     ScopedLock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00420 
00421     m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, name);
00422 
00423     txn->commit(0);
00424 
00425     // deliver event notifications
00426     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
00427                                                 child_name));
00428     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event_ptr);
00429   }
00430   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00431 
00432   cb->response_ok();
00433 }

00440 void
00441 Master::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name,
00442     uint32_t flags, uint32_t event_mask, std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00443   std::string child_name;
00444   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00445   NodeDataPtr node_data;
00446   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00447   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00448   bool created = false;
00449   bool is_dir = false;
00450   bool existed;
00451   uint64_t handle;
00452   bool lock_notifiy = false;
00453   uint32_t lock_mode = 0;
00454   uint64_t lock_generation = 0;
00455   bool create_notification_delivered = false;
00456 
00457   if (m_verbose) {
00458     HT_INFOF("open(session_id=%llu, fname=%s, flags=0x%x, event_mask=0x%x)",
00459              (Llu)session_id, name, flags, event_mask);
00460   }
00461 
00462   assert(name[0] == '/');
00463 
00464   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00465     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00466 
00467   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name))
00468     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00469 
00470   if (!init_attrs.empty() && !(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00471     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CREATE_FAILED,
00472              "initial attributes can only be supplied on CREATE");
00473 
00474   // If path name to open is "/", then create a dummy NodeData object for
00475   // the parent because the previous call will return the node itself as
00476   // the parent, causing the second of the following two mutex locks to hang
00477   if (!strcmp(name, "/"))
00478     parent_node = new NodeData();
00479 
00480   get_node(name, node_data);
00481 
00482   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00483     ScopedLock parent_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00484     ScopedLock node_lock(node_data->mutex);
00485 
00486     if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) {
00487       if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0)
00488         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00489       lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00490       if (node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00491         lock_notifiy = true;
00492     }
00493     else if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) {
00494       if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0 ||
00495           !node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00496         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00497       lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00498       lock_notifiy = true;
00499     }
00500 
00501     existed = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name, &is_dir);
00502 
00503     if (existed) {
00504       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE) && (flags & OPEN_FLAG_EXCL))
00505         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "mode=CREATE|EXCL");
00506 
00507       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP))
00508         HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "Unable to open TEMP file "
00509                   "'%s' because it already exists", name);
00510       // Read/create 'lock.generation' attribute
00511       if (node_data->lock_generation == 0) {
00512         if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00513                                      &node_data->lock_generation)) {
00514           node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00515           m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00516                                   node_data->lock_generation);
00517         }
00518       }
00519     }
00520     else {
00521       if (!(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00522         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00523 
00524       m_bdb_fs->create(txn, name, (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP));
00525       node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00526       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00527                               node_data->lock_generation);
00528       // Set the initial attributes
00529       for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++)
00530         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, name, init_attrs[i].name,
00531                             init_attrs[i].value, init_attrs[i].value_len);
00532       if (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP)
00533         node_data->ephemeral = true;
00534       created = true;
00535     }
00536 
00537     if (!handle_data)
00538       create_handle(&handle, handle_data);
00539 
00540     handle_data->node = node_data.get();
00541     handle_data->open_flags = flags;
00542     handle_data->event_mask = event_mask;
00543     handle_data->session_data = session_data;
00544 
00545     session_data->add_handle(handle);
00546 
00547     if (created && !create_notification_delivered) {
00548       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00549                                               child_name));
00550       deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00551       create_notification_delivered = true;
00552     }
00553 
00557     if (lock_mode != 0) {
00558       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00559       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00560                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00561       lock_generation = handle_data->node->lock_generation;
00562       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = lock_mode;
00563 
00564       lock_handle(handle_data, lock_mode);
00565 
00566       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00567       if (lock_notifiy) {
00568         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(lock_mode));
00569         deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00570       }
00571     }
00572 
00573     handle_data->node->add_handle(handle, handle_data);
00574 
00575     HT_INFOF("handle %llu created ('%s', session=%llu, flags=0x%x, mask=0x%x)",
00576              (Llu)handle_data->id, handle_data->node->name.c_str(),
00577              (Llu)session_id, handle_data->open_flags, handle_data->event_mask);
00578 
00579     txn->commit(0);
00580   }
00581   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00582 
00583   cb->response(handle, created, lock_generation);
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00590 void Master::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00591   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00592   int error;
00593   std::string errmsg;
00594   size_t n;
00595 
00596   if (m_verbose) {
00597     HT_INFOF("close(session=%llu, handle=%llu)", (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00598   }
00599 
00600   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00601     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00602     return;
00603   }
00604 
00605   {
00606     ScopedLock slock(session_data->mutex);
00607     n = session_data->handles.erase(handle);
00608   }
00609 
00610   if (n) {
00611     if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg)) {
00612       cb->error(error, errmsg);
00613       return;
00614     }
00615   }
00616 
00617   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00618     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00619   }
00620 }

00623 
00627 void
00628 Master::attr_set(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00629                  const char *name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00630   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00631   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00632   int error;
00633 
00634   if (m_verbose) {
00635     HT_INFOF("attrset(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s, value_len=%d)",
00636              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name, (int)value_len);
00637   }
00638 
00639   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00640     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00641 
00642   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00643     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00644 
00645   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00646     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00647 
00648     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, value, value_len);
00649 
00650     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET, name));
00651     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00652 
00653     txn->commit(0);
00654   }
00655   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00656 
00657   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00658     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00659 }
00660 
00661 
00665 void
00666 Master::attr_get(ResponseCallbackAttrGet *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00667                  uint64_t handle, const char *name) {
00668   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00669   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00670   int error;
00671   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00672 
00673   if (m_verbose)
00674     HT_INFOF("attrget(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00675              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00676 
00677   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00678     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00679 
00680   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00681     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00682 
00683   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00684     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00685 
00686     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, dbuf))
00687       HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND, name);
00688 
00689     txn->commit(0);
00690   }
00691   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00692 
00693   StaticBuffer buffer(dbuf);
00694 
00695   if ((error = cb->response(buffer)) != Error::OK)
00696     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00697 }

00701 Master::attr_del(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,

00704   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00705   int error;

00708     HT_INFOF("attrdel(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00709              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00710 
00711   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00712     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00713 
00714   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00715     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00716 
00717 
00718   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00719     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00720 
00721     m_bdb_fs->del_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name);
00722 
00723     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL, name));
00724     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00725 
00726     txn->commit(0);
00727   }
00728   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00729 
00730   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00731     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00732 }

00734 void
00735 Master::attr_exists(ResponseCallbackAttrExists *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00736                     const char *name)
00737 {
00738   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00739   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00740   int error;
00741   bool exists=false;
00742 
00743   if (m_verbose)
00744     HT_INFOF("attr_exists(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00745              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00746 
00747   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00748     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00749 
00750   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00751     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00752 
00753   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00754     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00755 
00756     if (m_bdb_fs->exists_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name))
00757       exists = true;
00758 
00759     txn->commit(0);
00760   }
00761   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00762 
00763   if ((error = cb->response(exists)) != Error::OK)
00764     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00765 }

00799 void
00800 Master::exists(ResponseCallbackExists *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00801                const char *name) {

00806     HT_INFOF("exists(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00807 
00808   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00809 
00810   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00811     file_exists = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name);
00812     txn->commit(0);
00813   }
00814   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00815 
00816   if ((error = cb->response(file_exists)) != Error::OK)
00817     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));

00850 
00851 
00852 void
00853 Master::lock(ResponseCallbackLock *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00854              uint32_t mode, bool try_lock) {
00855   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00856   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00857   bool notify = true;
00858 
00859   if (m_verbose) {
00860     HT_INFOF("lock(session=%llu, handle=%llu, mode=0x%x, try_lock=%d)",
00861              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, mode, try_lock);
00862   }
00863 
00864   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00865     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00866     return;
00867   }
00868 
00869   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00870     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00871               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00872     return;
00873   }
00874 
00875   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK)) {
00876     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00877               "handle not open for locking");
00878     return;
00879   }
00880 
00881   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_WRITE)) {
00882     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00883               "handle not open for writing");
00884     return;
00885   }
00886 
00887   {
00888     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00889     NodeData::LockRequestList &pending_lock_reqs =
00890         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs;
00891 
00892     if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00893       if (try_lock)
00894         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00895       else {
00896         pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00897         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00898       }
00899       return;
00900     }
00901     else if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED) {
00902       if (mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00903         if (try_lock)
00904           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00905         else {
00906           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00907           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00908         }
00909         return;
00910       }
00911 
00912       assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED);
00913 
00914       if (!pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00915         if (try_lock)
00916           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00917         else {
00918           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00919           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00920         }
00921         return;
00922       }
00923     }
00924 
00925     // at this point we're OK to acquire the lock
00926     if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED &&
00927         !handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00928       notify = false;
00929 
00930     handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00931 
00932     HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00933       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
00934                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00935       txn->commit(0);
00936     }
00937     HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00938 
00939     handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = mode;
00940     lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00941 
00942     // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00943     if (notify) {
00944       HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockAcquired(mode));
00945       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr);
00946     }
00947 
00948     cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED, handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00949   }
00950 }
00951 
00955 void Master::lock_handle(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, uint32_t mode) {
00956   if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00957     handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.insert(handle_data->id);
00958   else {
00959     assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE);
00960     handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = handle_data->id;
00961   }
00962   handle_data->locked = true;
00963 }
00964 
00968 void
00969 Master::lock_handle_with_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
00970                                       uint32_t mode, bool wait_for_notify) {
00971   lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00972 
00973   // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00974   HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockGranted(mode,
00975                            handle_data->node->lock_generation));
00976   deliver_event_notification(handle_data, event, wait_for_notify);
00977 }
00978 
00979 
00980 
00984 void
00985 Master::release(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00986   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00987   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00988 
00989   if (m_verbose) {
00990     HT_INFOF("release(session=%llu, handle=%llu)",
00991              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00992   }
00993 
00994   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00995     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00996     return;
00997   }
00998 
00999   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
01000     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
01001               std::string("handle=") + handle);
01002     return;
01003   }
01004 
01005   release_lock(handle_data);
01006 
01007   cb->response_ok();
01008 }
01009 
01010 
01011 void Master::release_lock(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, bool wait_for_notify) {
01012   ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
01013   vector<HandleDataPtr> next_lock_handles;
01014   int next_mode = 0;
01015 
01016   if (handle_data->locked) {
01017     if (handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle != 0) {
01018       assert(handle_data->id == handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle);
01019       handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = 0;
01020     }
01021     else {
01022       unsigned int count = handle_data->node->
01023           shared_lock_handles.erase(handle_data->id);
01024       HT_ASSERT(count);
01025     }
01026     handle_data->locked = false;
01027   }
01028   else
01029     return;
01030 
01031   // deliver LOCK_RELEASED notifications if no more locks held on node
01032   if (handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty()) {
01033     HT_INFO("About to deliver lock released notifications");
01034     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockReleased());
01035     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr, wait_for_notify);
01036     HT_INFO("Finished delivering lock released notifications");
01037   }
01038 
01039   handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = 0;
01040 
01041   if (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
01042     HandleDataPtr next_handle;
01043     const LockRequest &front_lock_req = handle_data->node->
01044         pending_lock_reqs.front();
01045     if (front_lock_req.mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
01046       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
01047       if (get_handle_data(front_lock_req.handle, next_handle))
01048         next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
01049       handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
01050     }
01051     else {
01052       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
01053       do {
01054         const LockRequest &lockreq = handle_data->node->
01055             pending_lock_reqs.front();
01056         if (lockreq.mode != LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
01057           break;
01058         if (get_handle_data(lockreq.handle, next_handle))
01059           next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
01060         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
01061       } while (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty());
01062     }
01063 
01064     if (!next_lock_handles.empty()) {
01065       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
01066 
01067       HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01068         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
01069                                 handle_data->node->lock_generation);
01070         txn->commit(0);
01071       }
01072       HT_BDBTXN_END();
01073 
01074       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = next_mode;
01075 
01076       for (size_t i=0; i<next_lock_handles.size(); i++) {
01077         assert(handle_data->id != next_lock_handles[i]->id);
01078         lock_handle_with_notification(next_lock_handles[i], next_mode,
01079                                       wait_for_notify);
01080       }
01081 
01082       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
01083       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(next_mode));
01084       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event, wait_for_notify);
01085     }
01086   }
01087 }
01088 
01089 
01093 void
01094 Master::deliver_event_notifications(NodeData *node,
01095     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01096   int notifications = 0;
01097 
01098   // log event
01099   for (HandleMap::iterator iter = node->handle_map.begin();
01100        iter != node->handle_map.end(); ++iter) {
01101     HT_DEBUGF("Delivering notification (%d == %d)", (*iter).second->event_mask,
01102               event_ptr->get_mask());
01103 
01104     if ((*iter).second->event_mask & event_ptr->get_mask()) {
01105       (*iter).second->session_data->add_notification(
01106           new Notification((*iter).first, event_ptr));
01107       HT_DEBUGF("Adding notification %s id=%llu session=%llu flags=%u mask=%u",
01108                 (*iter).second->node->name.c_str(), (Llu)(*iter).second->id,
01109                 (Llu)(*iter).second->session_data->id,
01110                 (*iter).second->open_flags, (*iter).second->event_mask);
01111       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01112           (*iter).second->session_data->id);
01113       notifications++;
01114     }
01115   }
01116 
01117   if (wait_for_notify && notifications)
01118     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01119 }
01120 
01121 
01125 void
01126 Master::deliver_event_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
01127     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01128 
01129   // log event
01130   handle_data->session_data->add_notification(
01131       new Notification(handle_data->id, event_ptr));
01132   HT_DEBUGF("Adding notification %s id=%llu session=%llu flags=%u mask=%u",
01133             handle_data->node->name.c_str(), (Llu)handle_data->id,
01134             (Llu)handle_data->session_data->id, handle_data->open_flags,
01135             handle_data->event_mask);
01136   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01137       handle_data->session_data->id);
01138 
01139   if (wait_for_notify)
01140     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01141 }
01142 
01143 
01144 
01148 bool
01149 Master::find_parent_node(const std::string &normal_name,
01150                          NodeDataPtr &parent_node, std::string &child_name) {
01151   NodeMap::iterator node_it;
01152   size_t last_slash = normal_name.rfind("/", normal_name.length());
01153 
01154   child_name.clear();
01155 
01156   if (last_slash > 0) {
01157     ScopedLock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01158     std::string parent_name(normal_name, 0, last_slash);
01159     child_name.append(normal_name, last_slash + 1,
01160                       normal_name.length() - last_slash - 1);
01161     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01162 
01163     if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01164       parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01165     else {
01166       parent_node = new NodeData();
01167       parent_node->name = parent_name;
01168       m_node_map[parent_name] = parent_node;
01169     }
01170     return true;
01171   }
01172   else if (last_slash == 0) {
01173     ScopedLock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01174     std::string parent_name = "/";
01175     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01176     assert (node_it != m_node_map.end());
01177     child_name.append(normal_name, 1, normal_name.length() - 1);
01178     parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01179     return true;
01180   }
01181 
01182   return false;
01183 }
01184 
01185 
01189 bool
01190 Master::destroy_handle(uint64_t handle, int *errorp, std::string &errmsg,
01191                        bool wait_for_notify) {
01192   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
01193   unsigned int refcount = 0;
01194 
01195   if (!remove_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
01196     *errorp = Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
01197     errmsg = std::string("handle=") + handle;
01198     return false;
01199   }
01200 
01201   {
01202     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
01203 
01204     handle_data->node->remove_handle(handle_data->id);
01205     refcount = handle_data->node->reference_count();
01206   }
01207 
01208   release_lock(handle_data, wait_for_notify);
01209 
01210   if (refcount == 0) {
01211 
01212     if (handle_data->node->ephemeral) {
01213       std::string child_name;
01214       NodeDataPtr parent_node;
01215 
01216       if (find_parent_node(handle_data->node->name, parent_node, child_name)) {
01217         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
01218                                                 child_name));
01219         deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event, wait_for_notify);
01220       }
01221 
01222       // remove file from database
01223       HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01224         m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, handle_data->node->name);
01225         txn->commit(0);
01226       }
01227       HT_BDBTXN_END(false);
01228 
01229       // remove node
01230       NodeMap::iterator node_it = m_node_map.find(handle_data->node->name);
01231 
01232       if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01233         m_node_map.erase(node_it);
01234     }
01235   }
01236 
01237   return true;
01238 }
01239 
01240 
01243 void Master::get_generation_number() {
01244 
01245   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01246     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01247                                  &m_generation))
01248       m_generation = 0;
01249 
01250     m_generation++;
01251     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01252                             m_generation);
01253     txn->commit(0);
01254   }
01255   HT_BDBTXN_END();
01256 }
